name: backend
description: MeetPulse is a dynamic web application designed for seamless communication and collaboration. Leveraging the MERN stack, MeetPulse offers a comprehensive suite of features including:Real-Time Chat: Engage in instant messaging with individuals or groups.Video Calls & Meetings: Host high-quality video calls and virtual meetings with ease.Screen Sharing: Share your screen effortlessly to enhance presentations and collaborative work.With MeetPulse, users can connect and collaborate effectively, making it an ideal solution for both professional and personal communication needs.
author: Pratibha Kumari
